trans-unit.source: Contains event data for the <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainShutdown"></xref> event and the <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainUnloaded"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 이벤트 데이터를 포함 된 <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainShutdown"> </xref> 이벤트 및 <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainUnloaded"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.AppDomain> instance is shut down or unloaded, an <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainShutdown> event or an <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainUnloaded> event is raised, respectively.
The BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs object stores the reason for the shutdown or unload and is passed to the event handler as one of its parameters.
trans-unit.target: BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs 개체 종료 이유를 저장 하 고 또는 언로드, 해당 매개 변수 중 하나로 이벤트 처리기에 전달 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs"></xref> class.

This constructor creates a new instance of <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs> with the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs.Reason%2A> property set to `reason`.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자의 새 인스턴스를 만듭니다. <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs>와 <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs.Reason%2A>속성이로 설정 `reason`.</xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs.Reason%2A> </xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The reason for the hosted application domain shutdown.
trans-unit.target: 호스팅된 응용 프로그램 도메인이 종료에 대 한 설명입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the reason the hosted application domain was shut down.
trans-unit.target: 호스팅된 응용 프로그램 도메인이 종료 된 이유를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The Reason property stores an <xref:System.Web.ApplicationShutdownReason> object as its value that describes why the <xref:System.AppDomain> instance was shut down.
trans-unit.target: 이유 속성 저장는 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationShutdownReason>이유를 설명 하는 값으로 개체는 <xref:System.AppDomain>인스턴스 종료 되었습니다.</xref:System.AppDomain> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationShutdownReason>
